duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble, test, and perform software loads on Hewlett Packard (HP) computer workstations/systems.
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and repair computer systems while maintaining parts and component inventories to support customer requirements.
Perform final assembly of computer systems and configure application software for customer delivery.
Test, repair, and maintain hardware inventory, identifying, verifying, and documenting all hardware issues.
Perform shipping and receiving functions of systems and parts as required.
Manage parts inventory life cycle processes, including inventory management records, parts return process, and inventory reporting.
Administer Customer Service Knowledge Management processes and tools, identifying, verifying, and documenting build, repair, configuration, and testing processes.
Provide technical expertise to customer support personnel as needed.
Able to lift boxes up to 70lbs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required. Related experience in computer hardware repair or assembly.
Working knowledge of PC hardware components and Windows OS (Windows 10). Computer certifications a plus (e.g., CompTIA A+, MCSA, MCSE, etc.).
